Tosca Testsuite Test Case Design
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Tosca Testsuite offers various products to help streamline and ensure efficient testing. An added feature to Tosca Testsuite is the ability to design Test Cases. Not only does this help you to create the right Test Cases, but also the right amount - with minimal time and effort. Learn more about Test Case Design with these helpful links:
- Introduction <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm#testcase_design/introduction.htm%3FTocPath%3DTestCase-Design%2520section%2520%28red%29|_____0> to Test Case Design
- Inner Values <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/content/testcase_design/videos/video_inner_value.htm> to determine functional test coverage
- Examples <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/822/index.htm?#testcase_design/example.htm%3FTocPath%3DTestCase-Design%2520section%2520(red)%7C_____10> in Test Case Design
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way! Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricents.com>
